entries.name: Azurite
entries.description: Deep blue opaque stone with teal clusters.

entries.name: Agate
entries.description: Banded smoothed stone of many colors

entries.name: Quartz
entries.description: Translucent crystal shard of white.  Sometimes found with purple tips.

entries.name: Lapis Lazuli
entries.description: Bright blue smoothed stone with yellow flecks.

entries.name: Malachite
entries.description: Smoothed stone with ribbins of shades of green.

entries.name: Tigers Eye
entries.description: Smoothed stone with ribbins of shades of brown.

entries.name: Turquoise
entries.description: Smoothed teal stone with flecks of gray or gold.

entries.name: Carnelian
entries.description: Smoothed red-orange stone.

entries.name: Citrine
entries.description: Glassy translucent deep yellow gem.

entries.name: Jasper
entries.description: Smoothed stone of earth reds.

entries.name: Onyx
entries.description: Smoothed black stone.

entries.name: Zircon
entries.description: Glassy translucent aquamarine gem.

entries.name: Amethyst
entries.description: Glassy translucent purple gem.

entries.name: Chrysoberyl
entries.description: Glassy translucent yellow gem.

entries.name: Garnet
entries.description: Glassy translucent red gem.

entries.name: Blue spinel
entries.description: Glassy translucent deep-blue gem.

entries.name: Peridot
entries.description: Glassy translucent lime-green gem.

entries.name: Topaz
entries.description: Glassy translucent orange gem.

entries.name: Tourmaline
entries.description: Glassy crystal with a red tip towards a green gradient.

entries.name: Alexandrite
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] Changes to a deep green in natural daylight.
entries.description: Glassy translucent pink gem (in candle light).

entries.name: Black opal
entries.description: Smooth stone of wild colors.

entries.name: Sapphire
entries.description: Glassy deep-blue gem.

entries.name: Emerald
entries.description: Glassy deep-green gem usually cut square.

entries.name: Ruby
entries.description: Glassy deep-red gem.

entries.name: Diamond
entries.description: Glassy reflective gem.

entries.name: Obsidian
entries.hidden properties: [NATURE 12 | LORE 12] Commonly used to make primitive blades and tips.
entries.description: Black glasslike rock.

entries.name: Hematite
entries.hidden properties: [ALCHEMY 15 | METALWORK BACKGROUND] Hematite is commonly used to make iron.
entries.description: Shiney black bubbled stone.

entries.name: Gold nugget
entries.description: A small nugget of gold.

entries.name: Jade pendant
entries.description: Translucent green pendant carved of pure jade.

entries.name: Pearl
entries.description: White small opaque sphere.

entries.name: Black pearl
entries.description: Black small opaque sphere.

entries.name: Silver goblet
entries.description: A shiney goblet with a few small embedded gems interlayed on the rim.

entries.name: Silver ewer
entries.description: A shiney ewer (wine pitcher) with remarkable detail.

entries.name: Silver lamp
entries.hidden properties:
[ARCANA 10 | LORE 10] Jinn can inhabit such a lamp.
[ARCANA 18] Jinn will never willingly inhabit a lamp: this is a common misconception. There is, however, a very powerful and influential jinn that was trapped in a magical lamp.
entries.properties: Can be lit and produce 30 ft radius of light for 1 hour.
entries.description: A silver lamp that is filled with oil and has a hempen wick.

entries.name: Gold bracelet
entries.description: A golden bracelet of intricate detail.

entries.name: Copper chalice
entries.description: A simple bronze colored chalice.

entries.name: Wall mirror
entries.hidden properties: [LORE 17 | ARCANA 17] Vampires have no reflection in a mirror.
entries.description: A small mirror set in a wooden frame.

entries.name: Locket
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION] Can try to determine person in the portrait.
entries.description: A small locket that can be opened to reveal a portrait.

entries.name: Gold ring
entries.description: A golden ring with intricate detail.

entries.name: Silver necklace
entries.description: A necklace with intricate detail and a set gem.

entries.name: Gold brooch
entries.description: A golden brooch with intricate detail and set gems.

entries.name: Gold crown
entries.description: A golden crown set with gems.

entries.name: Tapestry
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION | LORE] Can try to determine scene in tapestry.
entries.description: A woven tapestry that hangs upon a wall.

entries.name: Masterpiece painting
entries.description: A detailed painting requring great craft set in an intricate frame.

entries.name: Music box
entries.hidden properties: [ARCANA 15] Some music boxes play magically, they are worth double the value.
entries.description: A wooden box that when opened plays music.

entries.name: Idol
entries.description: An idol of an evil god or powerful being.

entries.name: War mask
entries.description: A mask worn by tribal humanoids for ceremony or war.

entries.name: Bone statuette
entries.description: A small statue carved or assembled by bone.
